metadata.title: CVE-2023-50164 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An attacker can manipulate file upload params to enable paths traversal andunder some circumstances this can lead to uploading a malicious file whichcan be used to perform Remote Code Execution. Users are recommended toupgrade to versions Struts 2.5.33 or Struts 6.3.0.2 or greater to fix thisissue.

criterions.comment: libstruts1.2-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
